verbs.description: [ARG0: waterford - halfmoon schools] [V: overestimated] [ARG1: costs] a state audit of the waterford - halfmoon union free school district has concluded the district overestimated its spending and ballooned its fund balance beyond the state legal limit the june report from the state comptroller thomas dinapoli office indicated that from 2014 to 2017 the district overestimated its expenses by 8 27 million which led to unnecessary tax increase of 2 4 percent the audit also noted that its overestimation in 2015 - 16 swelled its unrestricted fund balance to 3 84 million which is 16 6 percent of its budget the allowable legal limit is 4 percent of a school district budget carol lyon waterford halfmoon union free school district
